Reviews.Title: great everyday laptop
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Richardson
Reviews.Content: HP made a solid product with this one.  Good performance from the I5 processor and 6 gig of RAM will handle all everyday tasks.  Opening programs and apps is screaming fast and it runs games pretty well!  Audio is great too!

Reviews.Title: Excellent laptop
Reviews.Author: Conor Kelley
Reviews.Content: Great laptop, only issue is that finding tech support for it is difficult.  I love the screen, sound, operating system...just about everything...however, my Wi-Fi is really weak and I can't find any tech support to help me out.  The laptop has all these great scans they can run to tell me my Wi-Fi is messed up, but no solutions.  Frustrating.

Reviews.Title: great company
Reviews.Author: Sherry L Nelson
Reviews.Content: Loved working with this company. They were on the spot, took my return without comment and were generally wonderful. I would recommend them to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Yen
Reviews.Content: I like this laptop, its been working great, the webcam it's not so good that I thought, the sound is Ok, the fingerprint is cool. It's a little bit heavy but is ok

Reviews.Title: Good Product..
Reviews.Author: amit
Reviews.Content: Speed is amazingit doesn't hang during work.. good entertainment laptopi am using at home, playing games and doing basic work.. there is no problem as such...I really recommend it to others...

Reviews.Author: Daniel Angarita Pérez
Reviews.Content: Excelente Producto me llego en perfectas condiciones tal cual lo pedí.Excelente Producto me llego en perfectas condiciones tal cual lo pedí.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: danny11b
Reviews.Content: I chose this product because of the ratings it was given.  I wrote the seller,and he described it well so I took the plunge.  I was very satisfied by the discriptors given by the seller.  He done well!  the ratings so far have been correct.  Would reccommend the product,And the Seller also!!
